maqras.text: 84|1|jab aakaash phat jaayega.
84|2|aur apane paalanahaar kee sunega aur yahee use karana bhee chaahiye.
84|3|tatha jab dharatee phaila dee jaayegee.
84|4|aur jo usake bheetar hai, phaink degee tatha khaalee ho jaayegee.
84|5|aur apane paalanahaar kee sunegee aur yahee use karana bhee chaahiye.
84|6|he insaan! vastutah, too apane paalanahaar se milane ke lie parishram kar raha hai aur too usase avashy milega.
84|7|phir jis kisee ko usaka karmapatr daahine haath mein diya jaayega.
84|8|to usaka saral haisaab liya jaayega.
84|9|tatha vah apanon mein prasann hokar vaapas jaayega.
84|10|aur jinhen unaka karmapatr baayen haath mein diya jaayega.
84|11|to vah vinaash (mrtyu) ko pukaarega.
84|12|tatha narak mein jaayega.
84|13|vah apanon mein prasann rahata tha.
84|14|usane socha tha ki kabhee palat kar nahin aayega.
84|15|kyon nahin? nishchay usaka paalanahaar use dekh raha tha.
84|16|main sandhya laalima kee shapath leta hoon
84|17|tatha raat kee aur jise vah ekatr kare
84|18|tatha chaand kee, jab vah poora ho jaaye.
84|19|phir tum avashy ek dasha se doosaree dasha mein savaar hoge.
84|20|phir kyon ve vishvaas nahin karate
84|21|aur jab unake paas quraan padha jaata hai, to sajda nahin karate.
84|22|balki kaafir to use jhuthalaate hain.
84|23|aur allaah unake vichaaron ko bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hai.
84|24|atah, unhen duhkhadaayee yaatana kee shubh soochana de do.
84|25|parantu, jo eemaan laaye tatha sadaachaar kiye, unake lie samaapt na hone vaala badala hai.
85|1|shapath hai burjon vaale aakaash kee
85|2|shapash hai us din kee, jisaka vachan diya gaya
85|3|shapath hai saakshee kee aur jisapar saakshy dega
85|4|khaeeyon vaalon ka naash ho gaya
85|5|jinamen bhadakate hue eendhan kee agni thee.
85|6|jabaki ve unapar baithe hue the.
85|7|aur ve eemaan vaalon ke saath jo kar rahe the, use dekh rahe the.
85|8|aur unaka dosh keval yahee tha ki ve prabhaavee prashansa kiye allaah ke prati vishvaas kiye hue the.
85|9|jo aakaashon tatha dharatee ke raajy ka svaamee hai aur allaah sab kuchh dekh raha hai.
85|10|jinhonne eemaan laane vaale nar naariyon ko pareeksha mein daala, phir kshama yaachana na kee, unake lie narak ka dand tatha bhadakatee aag kee yaatana hai.
85|11|vaastav mein, jo eemaan laaye aur sadaachaar bane, unake lie aise svarg hain, jinake tale naharen bah rahee hain aur yahee badee saphalata hai.
85|12|nishchay tere paalanahaar kee pakad bahut kadee hai.
85|13|vahee pahale paida karata hai aur phir doosaree baar paida karega.
85|14|aur vah ati kshama tatha prem karane vaala hai.
85|15|vah sinhaasan ka mahaan svaamee hai.
85|16|vah jo chaahe karata hai.
85|17|he nabee! kya tumhen senaon kee soochana milee
85|18|firaun tatha samood ko.
85|19|balki kaafir (vishvaasaheen) jhuthalaane mein lage hue hain.
85|20|aur allaah unhen har or se ghere hue hai.
85|21|balki, vah gaurav vaala quraan hai.
85|22|jo lekhapatr (lauhe mahfooz) mein surakshit hai.
86|1|shapath hai aakaash tatha raat mein "prakaash pradaan karane vaale" kee
86|2|aur tum kya jaano ki vah "raat mein prakaash pradaan karane vaala" kya hai
86|3|vah jyotimay sitaara hai.
86|4|pratyek praanee par ek rakshak hai.
86|5|insaan, ye to vichaar kare ki vah kis cheez se paida kiya gaya hai
86|6|uchhalate paanee (veery) se paida kiya gaya hai.
86|7|jo peeth tatha seene ke panjaron ke madhs se nikalata hai.
86|8|nishchay vah, use lautaane kee shakti rakhata hai.
86|9|jis din man ke bhed parakhe jaayenge.
86|10|to use na koee bal hoga aur na usaka koee sahaayak.
86|11|shapath hai aakaash kee, jo barasata hai
86|12|tatha phatane vaalee dharatee kee.
86|13|vaastav mein, ye (quraan) do-took nirnay (faisala) karane vaala hai.
86|14|hansee kee baat nahin.
86|15|vah chaal baazee karate hain.
86|16|main bhee chaal baazee kar raha hoon.
86|17|atah, kaafiron ko kuchh thoda avasar de do.
